issuing_body: Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), Office of the Deputy Secretary, ASTP/ONC
document_title: Request for Information: Accelerating the Adoption and Use of Artificial Intelligence as Part of Clinical Care
summary_plain_language: The Department of Health and Human Services is requesting public input on actions it could take to accelerate the adoption and use of artificial intelligence in clinical care.
who_it_applies_to: Members of the public and stakeholders with interest or involvement in artificial intelligence and clinical care
what_changed: Publication of a request for information seeking public comment; no regulatory requirements were announced
recommended_action: Review the request for information and consider submitting public comments if relevant
